description: Manifest describing the attack chain reference library directories and categories.

categories.name: Enumeration
categories.description: Attack chains focused on discovering and mapping target services.

categories.name: Privilege Escalation
categories.description: Post-exploitation chains that elevate privileges on compromised hosts.

categories.name: Lateral Movement
categories.description: Chains that pivot access across hosts and domains.

categories.name: Persistence
categories.description: Techniques for maintaining long-term footholds in target environments.
